Text:
this is amazing, thank you so much.

Will you be uploading 6-10 from the blu-rays/HDTV?  Right now the only 720p season besides your uploads is 10.
This is an awesome release! You da man! Any chance of getting the other seasons 6-10 in this format?

Why in the world are these shows sped up as if they're in PAL format when they're supposed to be from an HD DVD source?!  I'm very sensitive to this speed up issue, and I can't watch these rips now.  Ugh!!
